title: What is the Nitto ATP Finals schedule for Thursday & Friday?
description: Each Nitto ATP Finals competitor will return to Turin’s Inalpi Arena on Thursday and Friday for another taste of the action at the prestigious season finale. Here is the schedule for the next two days at the Nitto ATP Finals. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 14, 2024 CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am [3] Wesley Koolhof (NED) / Nikola Mektic (CRO) vs [7] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) Henry Patten (GBR) Not Before 2:00 pm [5] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Not Before 6:00 pm [2] Marcel Granollers (ESP) /Horacio Zeballos (ARG) vs [5] Max Purcell (AUS) / Jordan Thompson (AUS) Not Before 8:30 pm [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs [4] Daniil Medvedev Read More: Sinner & Alcaraz nearing Big Four levels of Top 10 dominance ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 15, 2024 CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am [8] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs [6] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS) Not Before 2:00 pm [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) Not Before 6:00 pm [4] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) vs [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) Not Before 8:30 pm [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) vs 8] Andrey Rublev [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Top seed Jannik Sinner will look to build on his run at the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals in a Thursday evening clash against Daniil Medvedev in Turin.

Nitto ATP Finals

World No. 1 Sinner leads evening session on Thursday

November 13, 2024

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

Jannik Sinner in action at the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals. By ATP Staff

Each Nitto ATP Finals competitor will return to Turin’s Inalpi Arena on Thursday and Friday for another taste of the action at the prestigious season finale.

Here is the schedule for the next two days at the Nitto ATP Finals.

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 14, 2024
CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am
[3] Wesley Koolhof (NED) / Nikola Mektic (CRO) vs [7] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) Henry Patten (GBR)

Not Before 2:00 pm
[5] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS)

Not Before 6:00 pm
[2] Marcel Granollers (ESP) /Horacio Zeballos (ARG) vs [5] Max Purcell (AUS) / Jordan Thompson (AUS)

Not Before 8:30 pm
[1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs [4] Daniil Medvedev

Read More: Sinner & Alcaraz nearing Big Four levels of Top 10 dominance

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 15, 2024
CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am
[8] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs [6] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS)

Not Before 2:00 pm
[2] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP)

Not Before 6:00 pm
[4] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) vs [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO)

Not Before 8:30 pm
[6] Casper Ruud (NOR) vs 8] Andrey Rublev
